name: Torture Chamber
description:
Torture Chamber is brutally violent game where "you" play as a blood lust murderer where you have to slowly torture your victim to death using multiple torture devises and weapons.

  • Weapons ranging from knifes to saw-blades to acid guns.
  • keep stats of how many Victims you've killed

Explore many ways to Torture, hammer the rib cage, smash the brain, poke the eyes out - this game is mostly a casual BUT Gorey game to have some fun with

Enjoy the limitless ways to torture your victim to death.
